/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, showcasing the architectural style of the city. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and white, reflecting the urban environment.
